name: @nuskey8/osc-wasm
description: Open Sound Control (OSC) library implemented in WebAssembly/Rust for browsers and servers

tasks.build-wasm: wasm-pack build osc-wasm --target web --no-pack --out-dir ../src --release && rm src/.gitignore
tasks.publish-npm: deno task build-wasm && deno task build-npm && cd npm && npm publish --access public
